Detailed Description

Datas relative to game context.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Data::Data ( Base *  base,
int  argc,
char *const *const   argv 
)

Constructor for game datas.

Parameters:
base main class of the game
argc number of arguments
argv param starting params These are like this : ./sokoban "pseudo" -t "widthxheight" "fr" sound music t : w for windowed mode, f for fullscreen mode sound : 1=on 0=false music : 1=on 0=false example : ./sokoban "michael" -f "800x600" "fr" 1 1
